entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 4:30 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -18.7°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19 except minus 24 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19 except minus 24 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 21 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the evening then northeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
